physicalMissions.name: Core & Balance Foundation
physicalMissions.description: Master stability in zero-gravity environments through core strength and balance training

exercises.name: AI-Monitored Planks
exercises.description: Maintain proper plank position while STELLA monitors your form and core engagement.
exercises.compliance: OSHA Safety Protocol: Zero-G Stability Training

exercises.name: Stability Ball Workouts
exercises.description: Perform core exercises on stability ball to improve balance and stability.

exercises.name: Single-Leg Balance Drills
exercises.description: Practice balancing on one leg to improve proprioception and stability.

premiumExercises.name: Zero-G Adaptation
premiumExercises.description: Specialized exercises to prepare for disorientation in microgravity environments.
premiumExercises.compliance: NASA-STD-3001 Space Flight Human System Standard

physicalMissions.name: Endurance Boost
physicalMissions.description: Build cardiovascular fitness for extended space operations

exercises.name: Interval Training
exercises.description: High-intensity interval training adapted for space conditions

exercises.name: Cardiovascular Adaptation
exercises.description: Exercises that help adapt cardiovascular system to space conditions

exercises.name: Recovery Techniques
exercises.description: Techniques to optimize recovery between cardio sessions

physicalMissions.name: Strength Training Without Gravity
physicalMissions.description: Build muscular strength for space operations in a zero-gravity environment

exercises.name: Resistance Band Training
exercises.description: Use resistance bands to simulate weight in zero-G

exercises.name: Bodyweight Resistance Exercises
exercises.description: Leverage your own body mass for resistance training

exercises.name: Multi-Directional Strength Training
exercises.description: Build strength that works in all directions of movement

physicalMissions.name: Microgravity Coordination Drills
physicalMissions.description: Master coordination and spatial awareness in microgravity environments

exercises.name: Spatial Orientation Exercises
exercises.description: Enhance your ability to orient yourself in three-dimensional space

exercises.name: Tool Manipulation Training
exercises.description: Practice precise tool handling in simulated microgravity

exercises.name: Multi-Axis Rotation Exercises
exercises.description: Train your vestibular system for rotation in multiple axes

physicalMissions.name: Grip & Dexterity Challenge
physicalMissions.description: Enhance hand strength, fine motor control, and grip endurance for EVA operations

exercises.name: Grip Strength Training
exercises.description: Develop hand and forearm strength needed for EVA tool operation

exercises.name: Fine Motor Control Drills
exercises.description: Practice precise finger movements while wearing space suit gloves

exercises.name: Precision Hand Movements
exercises.description: Execute precise hand positioning and rotation tasks

physicalMissions.name: Flexibility & Mobility for Space
physicalMissions.description: Develop joint mobility and range of motion needed for confined space operations

exercises.name: Zero-G Stretching Routines
exercises.description: Full-body stretching optimized for microgravity environments

exercises.name: Joint Mobility Drills
exercises.description: Enhance range of motion in key joints needed for EVA operations

exercises.name: Dynamic Microgravity Adaptation
exercises.description: Train your body to smoothly transition between different postures in space

physicalMissions.name: Postural Control & Adaptation
physicalMissions.description: Master control of your posture and spinal alignment in variable gravity environments

exercises.name: Neutral Spine Training
exercises.description: Develop awareness and control of spinal alignment in microgravity

exercises.name: Dynamic Postural Adjustments
exercises.description: Practice maintaining proper alignment during movement

exercises.name: Postural Awareness Drills
exercises.description: Enhance your body's position sense without visual feedback

physicalMissions.name: Reaction Speed & Reflexes
physicalMissions.description: Develop quick reaction times and reflexes critical for emergency response in space

exercises.name: Rapid Response Drills
exercises.description: Train for immediate action in response to visual and auditory cues

exercises.name: Hand-Eye Coordination Tests
exercises.description: Enhance coordination between visual input and physical response

exercises.name: Reflex Training with AI Feedback
exercises.description: STELLA analyzes and helps improve your neural response patterns

physicalMissions.name: Explosive Power & Force Control
physicalMissions.description: Develop controlled power generation for emergency scenarios and precise force application

exercises.name: Jump & Plyometric Drills
exercises.description: Develop explosive strength needed for emergency maneuvers

exercises.name: Controlled Strength Training
exercises.description: Practice applying precise amounts of force during tasks

exercises.name: Microgravity Force Application
exercises.description: Learn to generate and control force in the absence of gravity

physicalMissions.name: Recovery & Fatigue Management
physicalMissions.description: Master techniques to optimize recovery and manage fatigue during extended space missions

exercises.name: Active Recovery Techniques
exercises.description: Learn methods to accelerate recovery between demanding tasks

exercises.name: AI-Based Fatigue Monitoring
exercises.description: STELLA analyzes your fatigue patterns and provides personalized interventions

exercises.name: Breathing & Relaxation Protocols
exercises.description: Practice breathing techniques that optimize oxygen utilization and promote recovery
